content.en: Curve-surface intersections: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to efficiently and accurately compute intersections between different types of curves and surfaces. These algorithms combine analytic representation, adaptive subdivision, polyhedral faceting, numerical techniques, and elimination theory to solve the intersection problems. By using these intelligent algorithms, scientists are able to detect and eliminate self-intersections, calculate intersection points with guaranteed tolerance, and find the intersection curves of surfaces.
content.da: Krumme-flade-intersektioner: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for effektivt og præcist at beregne intersektioner mellem forskellige typer af kurver og flader. Disse algoritmer kombinerer analytisk repræsentation, adaptiv underinddeling, polyhedrale facettering, numeriske teknikker og eliminerings-teori for at løse intersektionsproblemerne. Ved at bruge disse intelligente algoritmer kan forskere opdage og eliminere selv-intersektioner, beregne intersektionspunkter med garanteret tolerance og finde intersektionskurverne af flader.
